resources.string: Reset all configurations to default values?

allow volume up to exit do not disturb mode

Battery icon will show up where the clear all button shows up
The charging animation may result in a poor user experience. Enable at your own discretion.
Use gradient color as a scale for the battery level
Display icon of activity that generates toast message
Display custom date before the clock
Must be in DateFormat eg. MM/dd/yy
Please enter a new label. Leave blank to revert to stock label.
Hide the traffic monitor when there is no activity
Hide the network traffic indicator arrows
Double tap to sleep on lockscreen
Double tap to sleep on status bar
Show current weather condition and temperature
This visibility configuration also applies to the ambient display
Show name of current city on left of image
Show current city temperature on right of image
Show visualizer on lockscreen when music is playing
Use a preset color instead of the generated color
Display negociated charger max current and voltage and battery temperature on lockscreen while charging
Show more options in restart menu
Show more options in restart menu if not locked
Disable power menu on secure lock screens
Use swipe up gestures for navigation
Must hide navbar. Swipe up from left/right is back. Swipe up center is home. Swipe up and hold is recents
Display left and right cursor buttons in navigation bar while typing.
Shift navabr and statusbar icons to prevent burn-in
How often to make icons shift
Enable media cover art on the lockscreen
Browse and select installed Bliss themes
Vibrate instead of playing a sound for in-call notifications
Only light up when fully charged
Lights in Do Not Disturb mode
When fast charging, use different color till 90% charged
Enable notification panel header weather display
Note\u003a you can install new icon packs from play store by searching for \"Chronus icons\"
Condition icon pack is used in quick settings and lock screen
Disables quick settings on secure lockscreen
%1$s edge of the status bar pulls down Quick Settings
Always show Quick Settings on status bar pulldown
Open quick settings when there are %1$s notifications
Open quick settings when there are no notifications
Show the brightness slider underneath quick settings
Show a brightness slider on bottom quick settings
Show a brightness icon to the left of the brighness slider to adjust auto-brightness
Show buttons on each side of the slider that increase/decrease by 5%
Information displayed at top of quick settings panel
Display a warning at bottom of QS panel when network is monitored by external apps or vpn
OmniSwitch is currently not enabled. Please enable it in the app settings.
Allow legacy apps to use full screen
Applications need to be restarted after changes
Peeking notifications will show for %d seconds
Disable heads up notifications in these applications
Don\'t show heads up from these applications
Prevent apps from appearing in recents

This is the time, after becoming inactive, at which we start looking at the motion sensor to determine if the device is being left alone. We don\'t do this immediately after going inactive just because we don\'t want to be continually running the significant motion sensor whenever the screen is off

If we don\'t receive a callback from AnyMotion in this amount of time + locating_to, we will change from STATE_SENSING to STATE_INACTIVE, and any AnyMotion callbacks while not in STATE_SENSING will be ignored
This is how long we will wait to try to get a good location fix before going in to idle mode
The desired maximum accuracy (in meters) we consider the location to be good enough to go on to idle. We will be trying to get an accuracy fix at least this good or until locating_to expires
This is the time, after seeing motion, that we wait after becoming inactive from that until we start looking for motion again
This is the time, after the inactive timeout elapses, that we will wait looking for significant motion until we truly consider the device to be idle
This is the initial time, after being idle, that we will allow ourself to be back in the IDLE_PENDING state allowing the system to run normally until we return to idle
Maximum pending idle timeout (time spent running) we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current pending idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the initial time that we want to sit in the idle state before waking up again to return to pending idle and allowing normal work to run
Maximum idle duration we will be allowed to use
Scaling factor to apply to current idle timeout each time we cycle through that state
This is the minimum time we will allow until the next upcoming alarm for us to actually go in to idle mode
Max amount of time to temporarily whitelist an app when it receives a high tickle
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an MMS
Amount of time we would like to whitelist an app that is receiving an SMS
This is the time, after becoming inactive, that we go in to the first light-weight idle mode
This is amount of time we will wait from the point where we decide we would like to go idle until we actually do, while waiting for jobs and other current activity to finish
This is the initial time that we will run in idle maintenance mode
Scaling factor to apply to the light idle mode time each time we complete a cycle
This is the maximum time we will run in idle maintenence mode
This is the minimum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the maximum amount of time we want to make available for maintenance mode when lightly idling
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a light doze
This is the minimum amount of time that we will stay in maintenance mode after a full doze
Maintenance mode light idle min timeout
Maintenance mode light idle max timeout
Maintenance mode light doze min timeout
Maintenance mode full doze min timeout

Actions will be executed on screen off. On screen on the previous state will be restored.
Network mode will be switched to 2G on screen off
GPS based location service will be disabled on screen off
Mobile data will be disabled on screen off

Number of minutes to wait before performing actions after screen on
